availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander W. Paxton (Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Dugless Paxton in Green County, Kentucky, on April 21, 1853. Married to Mary F. Workman Paxton in Green County on October 15, 1855. Father of John W. Paxton, Luther T. Paxton, Willia A. Paxton, Crittenden G. Paxton, Florence Paxton, and Symington Paxton. Blacksmith in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1860.
